title: Specifies due process requirements for determination that offender is a sex offender, sexual predator, sexually violent predator or predicate sex offender; repealer
summary: Brings the sex offender registration act concerning sex offender classification status into parity with case law as decided by the Federal Court of Appeals, Second Circuit; includes certain due process requirements for a sexual offender classification hearing.
